object.name: Attr
object.remark: DOM Attribute as used in Node.

fun.name: inst
fun.remark: Creates an attribute with given name and value.

fun.name: instInt
fun.remark: Creates an attribute with given name and integer value.

fun.name: getStr
fun.remark: Get a string value by key.

fun.name: getStrDef
fun.remark: Get a string value by key. Returns given default value if not found.

fun.name: getIntDef
fun.remark: Get an integer value by key. Returns given default value if not found.

fun.name: hasKey
fun.remark: Test if the given key was on the commandline.

var.name: argMap
var.remark: Argument values mapped with their key.

fun.name: scandir
fun.remark: Scans the directory for entries with given ending.

fun.name: listdir
fun.remark: Scans the directory for entries with given ending.

fun.name: cleandirlist
fun.remark: free all memory allocated by listdir()

var.name: dir
var.remark: Directory structure as defined in dirent.h.

fun.name: getDocNode
fun.remark: Document node keeps all 1st level nodes.

fun.name: getRootNode
fun.remark: This is probably what you want.

fun.name: node2String
fun.remark: Represents a node recursive as string.

fun.name: getStr
fun.remark: Search for a given attribute in the given node.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Default value if attribute or node is not found in the document.

fun.name: getInt
fun.remark: Search for a given attribute in the given node.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Default value if attribute or node is not found in the document.

fun.name: getBool
fun.remark: Search for a given attribute in the given node.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Default value if attribute or node is not found in the document.

fun.name: getEncodingProperty
fun.remark: Get XML encoding as a property: <?xml encoding="UTF-8"?>

fun.name: setIgnoreCase
fun.remark: Ignoring case in node and attribute names.

fun.name: isIgnoreCase
fun.remark: Ignoring case in node and attribute names.

fun.name: getEbcdic
fun.remark: Gets the ebcdic coding for the given ascii code.

fun.name: getAscii
fun.remark: Gets the ascii coding for the given ebcdic code.

var.name: file
var.remark: External converter file in XML format.

fun.name: trywait
fun.remark: Wait a given time for event to become posted.

fun.name: wait
fun.remark: Wait for event to become posted.

typedef.def: enum {OPEN_WRITE=0, OPEN_READONLY=1, OPEN_APPEND=2, OPEN_READWRITE=3, OPEN_RW=4, OPEN_RA=5, OPEN_R=6} openmode

param.name: openflag
param.remark: How to open this file. See typedef openmode.

fun.name: read
fun.remark: Reads from file; True if successful.

fun.name: write
fun.remark: Write to file; True if successful.

fun.name: flush
fun.remark: Writes all buffered byte on disk.

fun.name: close
fun.remark: Closes the file. It does not cleanup this object.

fun.name: fmt
fun.remark: Writes a formatted string into the file.

fun.name: forcerename
fun.remark: Renames a file, target will be removed if the newname already exist.

fun.name: setFilename
fun.remark: Sets the filename to use with this object.

param.name: truncate
param.remark: Truncates the file contents if set to true! Otherwise it is opened in appending mode.

fun.name: rewind
fun.remark: Sets the filepointer to the beginning of the file.

fun.name: setpos
fun.remark: Sets the filepointer to the given offset.

fun.name: getReaded
fun.remark: Gets the count of the readed bytes.

fun.name: getWritten
fun.remark: Gets the count of the written bytes.

fun.name: fileTime
fun.remark: Gets the modification time for the given file.

fun.name: setfileTime
fun.remark: Sets the modification time for the given file.

fun.name: getFilename
fun.remark: Gets the filename used by this file object.

fun.name: ripPath
fun.remark: Returns a pointer to the filename.

fun.name: getPath
fun.remark: Returns a new allocated path string.

fun.name: exist
fun.remark: Checks for file or directory existence.

fun.name: convertPath2OSType
fun.remark: Changes the separators according the OS.

fun.name: isRegularFile
fun.remark: False if given name points not to a regular file.

fun.name: setFuser
fun.remark: Sets the fuser command to use for isAccessed.

param.name: filename
param.remark: Path and filename of the fuser command.

fun.name: isAccessed
fun.remark: Checks with fuser if the file is accessed by another process.

fun.name: setFuserUsage
fun.remark: The Linux fuser returns a useable rc. With all other unixes we must use a temp file.

param.name: usage
param.remark: R for returncode and F for file.

const.name: FUSER_RC
const.remark: Use the fusers returncode to determine the access state.

const.name: FUSER_FILE
const.remark: Redirect the fuser output into a tempfile to determine the access state.

fun.name: append
fun.remark: Appends a buffer to the file.

fun.name: isAbsolute
fun.remark: Checks if given path is absolute.

fun.name: writeStr
fun.remark: Appends a string to the file.

fun.name: isDirectory
fun.remark: True if given name points to a directory.

fun.name: add
fun.remark: Adds an object to the list.

fun.name: insert
fun.remark: Inserts an object into the list.

fun.name: remove
fun.remark: Removes an object from the list by position.

fun.name: removeObj
fun.remark: Removes an object from the list by reference.

fun.name: get
fun.remark: Gets an object from the list by position.

fun.name: first
fun.remark: Gets the first object from the list.

fun.name: next
fun.remark: Gets the next object from the list.

fun.name: size
fun.remark: Gets the number of objects currently in the list.

fun.name: put
fun.remark: Put a new item in the map.

param.name: val
param.remark: An object ot put in the map.

fun.name: remove
fun.remark: Remove an item from the map.

fun.name: get
fun.remark: Get an item from the map.

fun.name: first
fun.remark: Get the first item from the map.

fun.name: next
fun.remark: Get the next item from the map.

fun.name: size
fun.remark: Get the size of the map. (Number of objects in the map.)

fun.name: haskey
fun.remark: Check if a map entry exist with the given key.

fun.name: getList
fun.remark: Get all mapped objects as a list.

typedef.def: enum {RocsAttrID=0, RocsCmdLnID, RocsDirID, RocsDocID, RocsEventID, RocsFileID, RocsLibID, RocsListID, RocsMapID, RocsMutexID, RocsNodeID, RocsQueueID, RocsSerialID, RocsSocketID, RocsStrID, RocsStringID, RocsSystemID, RocsThreadID, RocsTraceID, RocsEbcdicID, RocsMsgID, RocsStrTokID, RocsLASTID} RocsMemID

fun.name: alloc
fun.remark: Allocate memory and records sourcefile and line. (Use macro allocMem.)

fun.name: realloc
fun.remark: Re-Allocate memory and records sourcefile and line. (Use macro reallocMem.)

fun.name: free
fun.remark: Free up memory and records sourcefile and line. (Use macro freeMem.)

fun.name: getAllocCount
fun.remark: Returns number of allocated memory objects.

param.name: size
param.remark: Size of source to be copied.

fun.name: basecpy
fun.remark: A special copy function for creating rocs-based objects.

fun.name: setDebug
fun.remark: If set it prints for every allocation and free a line.

fun.name: allocTID
fun.remark: Allocate memory and records sourcefile and line. (Use macro allocIDMem.)

fun.name: freeTID
fun.remark: Free up memory and records sourcefile and line. (Use macro freeIDMem.)

param.name: size
param.remark: Size of source to be compaired.

param.name: size
param.remark: Size of memoryblock to be searched.

var.name: size
var.remark: Size of the allocated memory block.

param.name: create
param.remark: Create a mutex when not exist.

param.name: time
param.remark: Time to wait for the mutext.

typedef.def: enum {ELEMENT_NODE, TEXT_NODE, PROPERTY_NODE, REMARK_NODE, VARIABLE_NODE} nodetype

fun.name: toEscString
fun.remark: Serialize this node with escaped attribute values.

fun.name: setParent
fun.remark: Change or set parent of this node.

fun.name: findAttr
fun.remark: Search for an attribute with the given name.

fun.name: findNode
fun.remark: Search for a child node with the given name.

fun.name: findNextNode
fun.remark: Find next node with the same name.

param.name: node
param.remark: Node reference of previous find orfindNext.

fun.name: getChildCnt
fun.remark: Get the number of child nodes.

fun.name: getChild
fun.remark: Get an child node by index.

fun.name: getStr
fun.remark: Get an attribute value as string.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Value to return if attribute is not found.

fun.name: getInt
fun.remark: Get an attribute value as integer.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Value to return if attribute is not found.

fun.name: getBool
fun.remark: Get an attribute value as boolean.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Value to return if attribute is not found.

fun.name: setStr
fun.remark: Set an attribute value as string.

fun.name: setInt
fun.remark: Set an attribute value as integer.

fun.name: setBool
fun.remark: Set an attribute value as boolean.

fun.name: getNode
fun.remark: Same as findNode but if no node is found it creates one.

fun.name: getLong
fun.remark: Get an attribute value as long.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Value to return if attribute is not found.

fun.name: setLong
fun.remark: Set an attribute value as long.

fun.name: getFloat
fun.remark: Get an attribute value as float.

param.name: defval
param.remark: Value to return if attribute is not found.

fun.name: setFloat
fun.remark: Set an attribute value as float.

param.name: keepid
param.remark: do not overwrite id attributes at first level

var.name: attrmap
var.remark: Map of attributes which is only used incase of DocOp.isIgnoreCase() == False.

fun.name: count
fun.remark: Number of messages in the queue.

var.name: last[3]
var.remark: 0 points to the last low prio message, 2 to the high.

param.name: device
param.remark: Device name like com1 or ttyS0.

fun.name: open
fun.remark: Try to open and to initialize the port.

fun.name: setSerialMode
fun.remark: Set uart speed for MM or DCC

fun.name: waitMM
fun.remark: Do busy wait for MM protocol

param.name: usperiod
param.remark: Wait time from start of packet to start of packet

param.name: uspause
param.remark: Wait time from end of packet to start of packet

fun.name: getWaiting
fun.remark: Get number of bytes waiting to send.

fun.name: available
fun.remark: Get number of bytes available to read.

param.name: soft
param.remark: no direct IO if soft ist set

fun.name: readln
fun.remark: Read till a linefeed is detected.

fun.name: isTimedOut
fun.remark: Check if last returncode is a ETIMEDOUT error.

fun.name: readStr
fun.remark: Read til a terminating zero is detected.

fun.name: peek
fun.remark: Are some bytes waiting to be read?

var.name: multicast
var.remark: Socket is in UDP multicast mode.

fun.name: byteToStr
fun.remark: Converts binary data into a hex string like 0AFE...

fun.name: strToByte
fun.remark: Converts a hex string into binary data

fun.name: findc
fun.remark: Find the first occurrence of a character.

fun.name: endsWith
fun.remark: Check if str1 ends with str2.

fun.name: endsWithi
fun.remark: Check if str1 ends with str2. (ignoring case)

fun.name: copynz
fun.remark: Copies a zero terminated string as a non-zero terminated string.

fun.name: int2snz
fun.remark: Converts an integer into a non-zero string.

fun.name: long2snz
fun.remark: Converts an long into a non-zero string.

fun.name: snz2sz
fun.remark: Converts an non-zero string as a zero terminated string.

fun.name: getExtension
fun.remark: Returns a pointer to the string extension: [readme.txt] would return a pointer to [txt].

fun.name: isoDate
fun.remark: Creates an ISO date string: YYYY-mm-dd

fun.name: isoTime
fun.remark: Creates an ISO time string: hh:MM:ss

fun.name: fmtb
fun.remark: Formats a string into a buffer.

fun.name: getCntLinefeeds
fun.remark: Returns number of linefeed chars found.

fun.name: getLine
fun.remark: Returns pointer to the specified line.

fun.name: getNextLine
fun.remark: Returns pointer to the next line.

fun.name: equalsn
fun.remark: Equals till number off char is reached.

fun.name: equalsni
fun.remark: Equals ignore case till number off char is reached.

fun.name: snz2szID
fun.remark: Converts an non-zero string as a zero terminated string.

fun.name: getLineID
fun.remark: Returns pointer to the specified line.

fun.name: startsWith
fun.remark: Check if str1 starts with str2.

fun.name: startsWithi
fun.remark: Check if str1 starts with str2. (ignoring case)

fun.name: replaceAllSubstitutions
fun.remark: Replace all environment variables with there current values.

fun.name: encode4URL
fun.remark: replace special chars with url escapes

fun.name: decode4URL
fun.remark: replace url escapes with special chars

fun.name: hasMoreTokens
fun.remark: There are more tokens left to read.

var.name: countTokens
var.remark: Number of tokens in this string.

fun.name: getErrStr
fun.remark: Translates an error code into a string.

fun.name: getPathSeparator4OS
fun.remark: Path separator for a specific OS type.

param.name: async
param.remark: Start command async in a separate thread.

fun.name: getSigStr
fun.remark: Translates an signal number into a string.

fun.name: getGUID
fun.remark: Get global unique ID. (32 chars long)

param.name: macdev
param.remark: May be NULL to use the default device for getting the MAC address.

fun.name: getUNC
fun.remark: Translates a local path into a UNC.

fun.name: utf2latin
fun.remark: Translates fitting UTF-8 encodings into Lantin 15.

fun.name: writePort
fun.remark: write a byte to the port

fun.name: readPort
fun.remark: read a byte to the port

fun.name: requestQuit
fun.remark: Signals thread to stop as soon as possible.

fun.name: requestQuitAll
fun.remark: Signals all thread to stop as soon as possible.

fun.name: getAll
fun.remark: Get a list of all threads.

fun.name: post
fun.remark: Post a message into the queue.

fun.name: prioPost
fun.remark: Post a message into the queue.

fun.name: getPost
fun.remark: Get post from the queue. (NULL if nothing is in queue.)

fun.name: waitPost
fun.remark: Get post from the queue. (Wait until post comes in queue.)

fun.name: join
fun.remark: Waits for thread termination and returns True if ok.

typedef.def: void(*trcListener )(int level, char* module, char* msg, int rc, Boolean dump)

enum {TRCLEVEL_EXCEPTION=0x0001,TRCLEVEL_INFO =0x0002,TRCLEVEL_WARNING=0x0004,TRCLEVEL_DEBUG =0x0008, TRCLEVEL_BYTE =0x0010,TRCLEVEL_METHOD=0x0020,TRCLEVEL_MEMORY =0x0040,TRCLEVEL_PARAM =0x0080, TRCLEVEL_PROTOCOL =0x0100,TRCLEVEL_ERROR =0x0200,TRCLEVEL_PARSE =0x0400,TRCLEVEL_WRAPPER=0x0800, TRCLEVEL_USER1 =0x1000,TRCLEVEL_USER2 =0x2000,TRCLEVEL_MONITOR=0x4000,TRCLEVEL_XMLH =0x8000, TRCLEVEL_USER =0xF000,TRCLEVEL_CALC =0x10000,TRCLEVEL_ALL =0xFFFFFF} tracelevel

param.name: level
param.remark: Trace level(s) to be traced out.

param.name: all
param.remark: Send all traces to the listener.

fun.name: setMainThreadId
fun.remark: Set the thread id for main.

fun.name: println
fun.remark: Prints one line into the trace.

fun.name: setAppID
fun.remark: Sets the application id to use in the trace.

param.name: cargo
param.remark: Name of calling object or Trace instance.

fun.name: setNrFiles
fun.remark: Change the number of files before recycling the oldest.

fun.name: setExceptionFile
fun.remark: If set, exceptions are also traced in a separate file.

fun.name: setInvoke
fun.remark: Command to invoke when writing a new exception file.

fun.name: set
fun.remark: Replace or set the singleton with this one.

fun.name: getF
fun.remark: Get the current trace FILE object.

var.name: appID
var.remark: Application ID to use in traces.

fun.name: addTranslation
fun.remark: Add translation. Existing IDs are overwritten.

fun.name: hasKey
fun.remark: Test if the given key is in the XML.

var.name: msgMap
var.remark: Message values mapped with their key.

var.name: wrpMap
var.remark: Wrapper nodes mapped with their name.

param.name: header_tagname
param.remark: Optional tagname as alternative to xmlh.

param.name: bin_tagname
param.remark: Optional tagname as alternative to bin.

fun.name: read
fun.remark: Reads the Xmlh from buffer. True if complete header is read.

fun.name: getSizeByTagName
fun.remark: Get size of block by name.

param.name: idx
param.remark: Index. (Incase of a list of the same nodes.)

param.name: idx
param.remark: Index. (Incase of a list of the same nodes.)

fun.name: getXmlSize
fun.remark: Get size of xml block by index.

fun.name: getBinSize
fun.remark: Get size of bin block by index.

fun.name: getXmlName
fun.remark: Get node for xml block by index.

fun.name: getBinName
fun.remark: Get filename for bin block by index.

param.name: node
param.remark: Node to add in the Xmlh.

typedef.def: void(*jsListener )( int dev, int type, int number, int value, unsigned long msec )

fun.name: encode
fun.remark: encode the input file into mime64

fun.name: decode
fun.remark: decode the input file into it's
